attributes.action: Secure Funding For FASA Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: F.A.S.A - Forum for action against substance abuse - are a charity in Belfast & Bangor that provide vital support for people dealing with sunstance abuse, alcohol misuse, drug addictions & they provide support, counselling and help lines / offices that people can call in regarding themselves or worried about a family member or friend. They aren't currently receiving secure funding on an ongoing basis that would enable a 24/7 service to Northern Ireland. They would need 170k per year. Sign the petition to ask Stormont to provide this vital money! Save our communities!
